warning.message: You will be teleported home in 20 mins. Please be ready...
config.warp-time.name: Warp Time
config.warp-time.desc: The time when you will be teleported home.
config.warning-time.name: Warning Time
config.warning-time.desc: The time when the warning message appears.
config.warning-msg.name: Warning Message
config.warning-msg.desc: The message displayed to the player.
config.warp-bed.name: Warp to Bed
config.warp-bed.desc: If checked, warps you directly to your specific bed (Recommended for Multiplayer). Ignores the manual coordinates below.
config.target-loc.name: Target Location
config.target-loc.desc: Manual Override: The map name (e.g., FarmHouse). Ignored if 'Warp to Bed' is true.
config.target-x.name: Target X
config.target-y.name: Target Y
